summary: This is NOT a clothing replacement, but a transparent texture which should be placed over your chosen (preferably nude) body texture. Contains panties w. or w/o transparency, pantyhose, stockings and garterbelt in any combination/colour.
descriptionHtml:
09.12.2011: Added optional file: Ligerie texture for CBBE created by ChojinZero
ChojinZero was kind enough to modify the file for usage with CBBE body mod.

07.12.2011: Added optional file: finished DDS files without bra.

Made by Schlumpf34 @ Skyrim Nexus
Simplified Version 3.0 (complete)

THIS VERSION COMES WITH FINISHED .DDS FILES.
CHECK THE NEW SCREENSHOT TITLED SIMPLIFIED VERSION OVERVIEW TO SEE THE CONTENTS.

Comments and everything else at: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1664

******************************************************************************************************
Uses nude body texture of mod Natural_Nudes by Skyrim Nexus user paperninja.
Full credit to him for this texture. Included in this download is version 1.3 of his texture.
Downloading his mod is REQUIRED, since the necessary nude body mesh is NOT included in this download.

Find paperninja\'s mod here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1161
******************************************************************************************************

INSTALL:

1. Choose ONE of the included DDS files, and rename it to exactly: \"femalebody_1.dds\" without quotes
- check the jpgs to get an idea of the contents if you cant open the .DDS file.

2. Copy this file to ***\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female
- you will need to overwrite the one you got from the nude mod, so making a backup can\'t hurt.

3. Play game and enjoy

If you want any other colour, or combination of parts you can download version 2.0, which includes an .xcf file you can modify yourself in GIMP.

-----------Text below is for version 2.0-----------


-------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]EDIT 1 because I seem to be forgetting something everytime. 
To open the .DDS file you most likely have to use Photoshop or GIMP with the .DDS plugin (GIMP as well as the plugin are free - google them)[/b]
Here is the plugin I\'m using for opening the file in GIMP: http://code.google.com/p/gimp-dds/downloads/detail?name=gimp-dds-2.0.9.tar.bz2
-------------------------------------------------------------------

Made by Schlumpf34 @ Skyrim Nexus
Version 2.0 (final until further notice)

THIS IS FOR VERSION 2.0:

This will most likely be the last release of this file. I know that not everything matches to one pixel exactly, but no glaring mistakes should be visible.

Changes: 

Bra added
Incorrect seam deleted
Minor adjustments

Contents:

1. ONE .xcf file (for the free Photoshop alternative GIMP)
- layer 1: Bra black
- layer 2: panty black
- layer 3: stocking and garterbelt black
- layer 4: pantyhose black

2. FOUR .png fils with the same layers as mentioned above - those should work just as well

3. Readme

INSTALL:

This should go to the folder: ***\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female

The image is supposed to be pasted on top of the image within \"femalebody_1.dss\" (I have no idea what the texture without _1 at the end is used for, but you can replace that one too if you want)

IF FOR SOME REASON YOUR GAME USES THE FILE \"femalebody.dss\" (without _1 at the end) THEN YOU HAVE TO USE THAT ONE.

!-! do not replace the file entirely! copy one of the images and paste it on top so that the underlying body texture remains below the underwear !-!

PLEASE NOTE:

I have included all underwear parts separately (.xcf for GIMP users) and .png for everyone else.
This should enable you to create any colour/parts combination you want!

If for some reason anything does not work please let me know on SkyrimNexus!

STEP BY STEP INSTALL:

1. Extract to wherever you want
2. Open the .xcf in GIMP (no idea if photoshop can work with it) OR open the .png files
3. Find the file \"femalebody_1.dss\" in ***\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female
4. Open \"femalebody_1.dss\" in any graphic software (UPDATE: any software which can read .DDS (GIMP with plugin or Photoshop work))
4a. (optional) Back up the \"femalebody_1.dss\" file in case you want to go back to vanilla nude look more easily
5. Copy ANY OR ALL layers of the .xcf (combine visible layers to make it easier) OR copy the contents of the .png files you opened before.
6. Paste the copied data onto your nude body texture
7. Save \"femalebody_1.dss\" with your changes
8. Boot game, get naked (or get someone naked) and enjoy!
9. (optional) leave a comment or even a user screenshot with your results on Skyrim Nexus

IMPORTANT:

If you do not have such a file (\"femalebody_1.dss\" in Data/Textures/etc.) you are going to need to download one of the nude mods first! (a body texture is not included in this download)

Check this file: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=70 - it will provide a useable body texture and the relevant mesh for hiding the vanilla underwear. JUST ONE EXAMPLE - USE AND NUDE MOD YOU WANT

-----------------------------------------outdated info below-------------------------------------------------------------

EDIT 3: Careful guys - there is no censoring on the screenshots now!

EDIT 2: Because I was notified that installation instructions are missing (sorry!):

---------------------

[b]INSTALL:
 
This should go to the folder: ***\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female

The image is supposed to be pasted on top of the image within \"femalebody_1.dss\" (I have no idea what the texture without _1 at the end is used for, but you can replace that one too if you want)

!-! do not replace the file entirely! copy one of the images and paste it on top so that the underlying body texture remains below the underwear !-!

IMPORTANT: 
If you do not have such a file you are going to need to download one of the nude mods first! (a body texture is not included in this download)[/b]

Check this file: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=70 - it will provide a useable body texture and the relevant mesh for hiding the vanilla underwear. (feel free to use any other body texture your prefer though)

---------------------

EDIT: just noticed that I forgot to delete one short seam on the heel - shouldn\'t be too much of a problem tho.

This is actually the first time I\'m \"releasing\" anything to the public - figures that my first file is something like this :-P. I worked forever on landscape textures in Minecraft, so I thought I\'d try something different here :-)

If anyone really downloads this please feel free to leave a comment - I\'ll be happy to read anything you guys have to say. 

Some kind of matching bra will be created in the coming days probably. If any interest in this file exists here I\'ll upload that too.

Contents:

1. ONE layered .XCF (for the free Photoshop alternative GIMP) containing the following transparent layers: 

- Stockings and garterbelt WHITE
- Stockings and garterbelt BLACK
- Panty with transparent part RED
- Panty with transparent part BLACK
- Panty without transparency WHITE
- Pantyhose without crotch BLACK
- Pantyhose full WHITE

THE POINT OF THIS FILE IS THAT YOU ARE ABLE TO CREATE ALL KINDS OF COMBINATIONS

2. FIVE transparent .PNG files (I hope they work too) - in case you can\'t open the .XCF

- Black garter/stockings with red transparent panty
- Black garter/stockings with black transparent panty
- White garter/stockings with not transparent panty
- Black garter/stockings without panty at all (oh my gosh!)
- White Pantyhose

3. Example screenshots and Readme
